s = input()
n = len(s)
try:
    ai = s.index('M')
    bi = n - s[::-1].index('F')
    s = s[ai:bi]
    n = len(s)

    femcount = sum([1 if s == 'F' else 0 for s in s])

    cong = 0
    for a in s:
        if a == 'M':
            cong = max(0, cong - 1)
        else:
            cong += 1

    print(n - femcount + max(0, cong - 1))
except:
    print(0)

# https://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/353/D
s    = [0 if x=='M' else 1 for x in input()]
ans  =  0
pre  =  -1
num1 =  0

flg=False
for i in range(len(s)-1, -1, -1):
    if s[i]==1:
        flg=True
        num1+=1
    else:
        if flg==True:
            pre=pre+1
        ans=max(num1, pre)
        pre=ans
print(ans)
